snippet: A new version of the operating system is due soon, but it may take extra time for it to reach some phones.
abstract: Personal Tech Q&A on Google's new version of its Android operating system, red-eye reduction on camera settings, and Tip of the Week on correcting status updates on Facebook.
lead_paragraph: A new version of the operating system is due soon, but it may take extra time for it to reach some phones.

headline.main: Checking on Android Updates for Older Phones
